divs: sighting detailsdad passed away this summer, not long after his 89th birthday. i wish i'd asked him to write down the details, but unfortunately i didn't, and now it's too late. i'm not sure why i'm doing this now, but the story has always stayed with me, and i have to wonder if others recall this event. here's what i am able to remember: in early 1961, my father was driving alone after sunset in southern new hampshire. i think he said it was in february (or april?), near dover, maybe around 8:00. he said that he, as well as several other people on the road, witnessed a cigar-shaped craft flying low, with multicolored blinking lights. it hovered over the road and then quickly moved off and disappeared. my father was a levelheaded, intelligent, analytical person. he only brought it up once or twice in the 1970's\1980's, in a matter-of-fact manner. i have no reason to doubt his story. he had no idea what it was; he didn't speculate. i personally have never seen a ufo, nor do i know anyone else who has, but dad definitely did.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Dover
There were no other sightings in Dover on or around January 31st 1961
Summary: Southern New Hampshire early 1961, as recounted by my father
